title: Why am I level 30 but still not bronze. Help.
body: Why am I level 30, but still not bronze. Thank you for any help. :)

replies.body: Did u play ur ranked games

As others have mentioned, level 30 unlocked ranked games but you will need to play 10 placement matches to receive your rank.  We have a [Ranked Played FAQ ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ)that provides a comprehensive guide to how ranked games work.  Please let me know if you have any questions, and good luck in your placement games!
in order to recieve a rank you have to play 10 rank matches, these matches will test ur skill against bronze and silver players to determine where u are, after u will be placed in a league
